K10sf277_sc:1: Wal_1 bhavati sa samayo yad ayaṁ lokaḥ saṁvartate / saṁvartamāne loke yadbhūyasā satvā
K10sf277_sc:2: ābhāsvare devanikāye upapadyante / te tatra bhavanti rūpiṇo manomayā avikalā ahīnendriyāḥ
K10sf277_sc:3: sarvāṅgapratyaṁ gopetāḥ śubhā varṇasthāyinaḥ svayaṁprabhā vaihāyasagāminaḥ prītibhakṣāḥ
K10sf277_sc:5: Wal_2 tena khalu samayena mahāpṛthivī ekodikā bhavati ekārṇavā / tasyāṁ ekodikāyāṁ mahāpṛthivyāṁ
K10sf277_sc:6: ekārṇavāyāṁ vāyunā śaraḥ saṁmūrcchitaḥ saṁtanoti tadyathā pakvasya kṣīrasya śaraḥ
K10sf277_sc:7: saṁmūrcchitaḥ saṁtanoty evam eva tasyāṁ ekodikāyāṁ mahāpṛthivyāṁ ekārṇavāyāṁ vayunā
K10sf277_sc:8: śaraḥ saṁmūrcchitaḥ saṁtanoti / sa bhavati pṛthivīraso varṇasaṁpanno gandhasaṁpanno
K10sf277_sc:9: rasasaṁpannaḥ / tadyathā navanītam evaṁvarṇaḥ / tadyathā kṣaudraṁ madhv aneḍakam evamāsvādaḥ /
K10sf277_sc:10: Wal_3 bhavati sa samayo yad ayaṁ loko vivartate / vivartamāne loke satvā āyuḥkṣayāt karmakṣayāt
K10sf277_sc:11: puṇyakṣayād ābhāsvarād devanikāyāc cavitvā ihatye manuṣyasabhāgatām āgaccanti / te
K10sf277_sc:12: ’pi rūpiṇo pūrvavad yāvad dīrgham adhvānam tiṣṭhanti /
K10sf277_sc:13: Wal_4 tena khalu samayena na sūryacandramasau prajñāyete na rātridivasaṁ na māsaṁ ardhamāsaṁ
K10sf277_sc:14: na ṛtuṁ na kṣaṇalavamuhūrtaṁ prajñāyante … na strī na pumān / satvaḥ satva ity ekasaṁkhyāṁ gacchati /
K10sf277_sc:15: Wal_5 athānyatamo lolupajātīyaḥ satvaḥ aṁgulyagreṇa pṛthivīrasam āsvādayati / yathā yathāsvādayati
K10sf277_sc:16: tathā tathā pratikāṁkṣati / yathā yathā pratikāṁkṣati tathā tathā kabaḍiṁkāropakrameṇa praparibhuktaḥ /
K10sf277_sc:17: Wal_6 adrākṣur anyatame satvās taṁ satvaṁ kabaḍiṅkāropakrameṇa pṛthivīrasaṁ paribhuñjānam /
K10sf277_sc:18: dṛṣṭvā ca te ’pi satvā aṁgulyāgreṇa pṛthivīrasam āsvādayanti / yathā yathāsvādayanti
K10sf277_sc:19: pūrvavad yāvad kabaḍiṅkāropakrameṇa praparibhuktāḥ / yataś ca te satvā taṁ pṛthivīrasaṁ
K10sf277_sc:20: kabaḍiṅkāropakrameṇa praparibhuktās teṣāṁ kāye dṛḍhatvaṁ gurutvaṁ prajñāyete śubhavarṇo
K10sf277_sc:22: Wal_7 dharmatā khalu vāsiṣṭha andhakārasya loke prādurbhāvāt sūryacandramasau prajñāyete etc. as in 4.
